version_description:
RAKBANK Mobile Banking gets better and now allows you to do much more:
 
Product information
- Browse information for Banking, Insurance and Islamic products with ease
- Apply for products with the click of a button
- Share, refer products through Email and social media
 
RAKBANK Deals
- Browse daily, monthly and yearly offers from RAKBANKdeals.ae on the go
 
Mobile Banking – Stay connected with the Bank at anytime and anywhere
- Make enquiries, transfer funds, pay bills and much more

RAKBANK has launched an innovative MobileCash service which allows RAKBANK customers to withdraw cash from any RAKBANK ATM using their Mobile device. Benefits of MobileCash for customers:
• Initiate cash withdrawal through Mobile phone instead of visiting Branch.
• Withdraw cash from any RAKBANK ATM without the need of the Debit Card.
• Send MobileCash to anyone in the UAE through your phone.
In addition to this service, customers can apply for a new Islamic Takaful product through the App
Performance enhancements & Option to view all ATM’s in a specific Emirate.

1. App logo redesigned
2. An improved look and feel for RAKelite customers
3. Faster Funds Transfer process within UAE
4. Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements

1. View Combined Credit limit on Credit Cards
2. Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements

Some of the key features offered by ‘RAKBANK Digital Banking’ app are:  
•Unified login credentials - Single user name and password for any device
•Please note: Existing users of RAKBANK Digital Channels (Mobile or Online) need to use their existing user name and mobile banking password to log in and follow simple on screen instructions to set up their single username and password that can be used on any device. 
•Multiple Bill Pay – View and pay all your due bills in one click
•Quick View - View your balances on the go, using Touch ID (on iOS devices only)
•Quick Menu – Easy access to commonly used banking activities across the app
•Send Money – Enjoy simplified fund transfer process 
•RAKMoneyTransfer - Send money to India and Philippines instantly
•MobileCash – Withdraw cash from the nearest RAKBANK ATM using your app alone 
•Discover and Apply – Learn more and Apply for RAKBANK products 
•Swipe to view- Every time you see a red line next to an item just swipe to see additional information or functions
General bug fixes and performance improvements.
General bug fixes and performance improvements.
General bug fixes and performance improvements.
General Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
General Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
Bug Fixes for iOS 10.3 Release.
General Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.

Enjoy banking on the go with the new RAKBANK Mobile Banking App; designed with you in mind.

RAKBANK Mobile Banking App is now available with the following enhancements:
· Clean, fresh looking and all-new design with a personalized view
· Pay bills, send money and everything else you always do - only smoother.
· Discover Products, Amazing Deals, Chat conveniently and locate your nearest ATM/Branches all at your fingertips.
· Quick Balance – Use Face ID or Touch ID to check your balance without logging in.
· All of your beneficiaries and bill payees will be carried over to the new app and if you’ve registered for RAKTOKEN, then that’s all been taken care of too.
· Hassle free update - simply download and use your existing User ID and Password to log-in if you are an Existing Digital Banking User and if you are new to RAKBANK Mobile Banking then tap on Register to get going.

•Quick View - View your balances on the go, using Touch ID (on iOS devices only)
•Quick Menu – Easy access to commonly used banking activities across the app
•Send Money – Enjoy simplified fund transfer process 
•RAKMoneyTransfer - Send money to India and Philippines instantly

•Discover and Apply – Learn more and Apply for RAKBANK products 
•Swipe to view- Every time you see a red line next to an item just swipe to see additional information or functions
